page.title: 14Unemployment
page.content: Unemployment in Southport is quite high at present. The level in the numbers of people without a job varies according to the seasons. We found that because the town is a seaside resort that it had more jobs during the summer than in the winter.Many people get seasonal work on the funfair,ice-cream stalls and souvenir shops. The actual figures at the moment are that about one fifth of the working population are not employed. This means that about four fifths are working. The main employers are the Health and Education authorities, Service industries and Restaurants and Shops.
